entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 10:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: NNW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 except minus 14 in low lying areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7 except minus 14 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
